about_the_game:
Welcome to the early playtest for Red Filament!

Red Filament is an immersive exploration-heavy adventure full of mystery, danger, beauty, and consequence. Breach doors. Siphon fuel. Bypass security. Evade patrols. Follow the Filament until the last secret is revealed and the final question is answered.

Development Phases

  • First Playable: Basic gameplay, vibes, and visuals. Major pivots possible!    <-- You are here!

  • Vertical Slice: All major game systems implemented, but very short on content.

  • Closed Alpha: Supporting systems implemented. Art direction finalized. More content.

  • Closed Beta: Story finalized. Systems polish. More content.

  • Open Beta: Final polish & bugfixing.

  • Release: Everyone gets to play!
